meanings.definition: Poincianas: a type of flowering tree with bright red or orange flowers.
meanings.sent1: The poincianas in the park look beautiful with their vibrant red blooms.
meanings.sent2: People love to take pictures under the poincianas when they are in full bloom.
meanings.sent3: The poincianas in the garden seem to be showing off their colorful flowers to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The poincianas stand out in the landscape like fiery torches lighting up the surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the poincianas in full bloom is like a painting come to life.

meanings.definition: Poincianas: the plural form of poinciana, referring to multiple trees of this type.
meanings.sent1: We planted several poincianas in the backyard to create a colorful garden.
meanings.sent2: The street was lined with poincianas, creating a stunning display of red and orange blossoms.
meanings.sent3: The poincianas in the neighborhood seem to be having a party with their vibrant flowers.
meanings.sent4: The poincianas in the park form a canopy of fiery hues, shading the visitors below.
meanings.sent5: The poincianas in the forest create a magical atmosphere with their bright blooms.
